title: NEW RENOVATION!!! Brand new stainless kitchen! PARKING INC! SEE-VIDEO!
posting_body: September 1st move in date - broker's fee is 1 month's rent - VIRTUAL TOUR https://youtu.be/5Xj1RkpeYno
Nice large studio, garden level, large living area, new renovation, new hardwood floors, new kitchen with dishwasher, disposal, new cabinets, new appliances.
New renovation with brand new kitchen, new dishwasher, new cabinets, new appliances, new bathroom, recessed lighting, 1 parking spot is included with the rent.
The utilities are NOT included and run on electricity.
1 cat okay :)  Will be ready for an September 1st move in date.
The deposits are 1st month's rent, last month's rent.
The broker's fee is 1 month's rent.
Located in Somerville, quick drive to Cambridge, Downtown Boston, Inman Square, Harvard Square, MIT, arlington, Back Bay, Copley, Arlington, Fenway, Allston, Brighton and more.
Text Dennis from Precise Realty to show 781-475-9777
